data.name: Perfect Gold - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
This contains the full and remastered version of all the soundtracks used in Perfect Gold. Each track has its own unique, complementary sketch.

You can find the music files and sketches inside your Perfect Gold Steam game folder.
data.about_the_game:

You can find the music files and sketches inside your Perfect Gold Steam game folder.
data.short_description: This DLC contains the full and remastered version of all the soundtracks used in Perfect Gold.
data.supported_languages:
English*, German, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
